entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Powell River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:59 AM PST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 4.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Powell River Airport 1:12 PM PST Monday 13 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 4.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 40.2 km
Humidity: 92 %
Dewpoint: 3.3°C
Wind: WNW 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers early this afternoon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near the Strait of Georgia. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 13 February 2023
